text.Prompt:
Given a product name and product features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product name:
NCAA Unisex-Adult Football Mat

Product features:
9-ounce, 100 % nylon face
Recycled vinyl backing for a durable and longer-lasting product
Machine-made and tufted in the USA
Non-skid backing with taped borders for added durability
Machine washable; vacuum regularly and spot clean for any easy and quick clean

Product description:
text.Response A: This high-quality product provides a safe, reliable and comfortable solution for all your football needs. It is engineered with a 9-ounce 100% nylon face and a recycled vinyl backing that ensures durability, stability and safety. This football mat is machine-made and tufted in the USA, which ensures that it meets the highest standards of quality and performance. It is easy to maintain as it is machine washable and vacuum-friendly, making it easier to clean and maintain. Moreover, the non-skid backing with taped borders ensures that the mat stays in place, even in high-traffic areas. With its technical features and advanced materials, this football mat is the ultimate solution for all your football needs.
text.Response B: The NCAA Unisex-Adult Football Mat is a great addition to any football fan's home. It features a 9-ounce, 100% nylon face with a recycled vinyl backing for a durable and longer-lasting product. The machine-made and tufted construction in the USA ensures that this mat will last for years. It has a non-skid backing with taped borders for added durability, making it perfect for indoor or outdoor use. Machine washable and easy to spot clean, this mat is the perfect accessory for any football fan's home.

meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
